fields.description: A summary of the security risks associated with the component
The collection of security risk countTypes and the amount of each type
Description of component modification
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
A summary of the version risks associated with the component
The collection of version risk countTypes and the amount of each type
The policy status of the component.
The total file match count for each component version
Whether the BOM component has been manually adjusted from its original state
A summary of the operational risks associated with the component
The collection of operational risk countTypes and the amount of each type
A summary of the components activity
The number of contributors in the last 12 months
The number of commits in the last 12 months
The last date/time a commit was made to the project
The trend in the amount of work being put into the project.
The estimated number of releases newer than the represented release
A summary of the component review
The date/time a review was done
The URL where the user who performed the review may be read
Summary of the user who performed the review
Username of the user who performed the review
First name of the user who performed the review
Last name of the user who performed the review
The URL where the user who performed the review may be read
Indicator if the component in the project has been modified
The name of the component
The usages of the component within the project
The types of matches made to the component within the project .
The approval status of the component
True if the entry is suppressed/ignored, false otherwise
Which source the component comes from.
If present, the attribution statement for the entry
A summary of the license risks associated with the component
The collection of license risk countTypes and the amount of each type
The date the component was released
The origins of the component
A summary of the activity risks associated with the component
The collection of activity risk countTypes and the amount of each type
URL to the representation of the component
The combination of licenses assigned to the component
The display status of the license
URL to the representation of the license
The relation of contained licenses.
The ID of the license in the SPDX project's database, if available
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
The ownership status of the license.
Description of purpose that the component is used for in the project
If known, whether the component is in the attribution report
The review status of the component.

links.description: Resource representing the comments of the component
Resource representing the policys rules associated with the component
Resource representing the vulnerabilities of the component
Resource representing the files matched to the component
Resource representing the passing, violation, or override state of policies for the component
Resource representing the origins available. Only present for entries with an associated component version
Resource representing cyrptography data. Only present for entries with associated cryptography data
Resource representing the license adjustment endpoint for a component without an associated version
Resource representing the component's custom fields
Resource representing recommended upgrades from the currently used version
